info.title: Oodrive Sign
info.description: Connect and consume Oodrive sign's service through your workflows.

get.summary: Get a list of all contracts
get.description: Retrieve all contracts from the associated license.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum size of the returned array of contract.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The sequence number of contract that will be skipped.

parameters.name: get_properties
parameters.description: If true, contract properties will be listed in the response.

parameters.name: get_perimeters
parameters.description: If true, contract perimeters will be listed in the response.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Will list contract created before the given date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Will list contract created after the given date.

parameters.name: perimeter
parameters.description: List contracts only in a given perimeter.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Retrieve contract only with specified status.

post.description: Create a new contract in the environment.

name.description: Name of the newly created contract (Required).

contract_definition_id.description: ID of the contract definition. Refer to your licence's API variable. Default to PDF AdHoc template.

date.description: Date of the contract. Default to Date.Now(). Must be in milliseconds.

message_title.description: Object of the email sent. Leave empty for a default title.

message_body.description: Body of the email sent. Leave empty for a default message.

keep_on_move.description: Activate or not off-line signature on mobile device

auto_close.description: Specify if countersignature is performed without human intervention.

customer_number.description: For legacy mobile applications compatibility only.

items.description: Perimeter's key the contract will be attached to.

contract_properties.description: List of all optional contract properties (if queried).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to retrieve status.

post.summary: Create contract and send it for signature
post.description: All in one operation. Create contract, add recipients, documents, and send it for signature to recipients.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Metadata of the all in one contract.

date.description: Date at which the contract has been created.

vendor_email.description: E-mail address of the Oodrive's license owner.

contract_definition_id.description: ID of the contract definition used for this contract.

message_title.description: E-mail subject when sent for signature.

message_body.description: E-mail body when sent for signature.

keep_on_move.description: Determine if the offline signature on mobile device is activated.

closed_date.description: Date of closure of the contract, if there are any.

canceled_reason.description: Reason of the cancel, if there are any.

auto_close.description: Specify if the contract will be countersigned automatically or need a human intervention.

deleted.description: Specify if the contract has been deleted or not.

perimeters.description: List of all perimeters of the contract (if queried).

options.description: List of all specific options of the contract (if queried).

contract_properties.description: List of all optional contract properties (if queried).

200.description: Contract, recipient for contract, document and attachments information.

pdfparts.description: Array of PDF bound to the contract.

has_smart_field.description: Specify if there is smart fields in the contract.

get.description: Retrieve metadata of a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The contract ID to retrieve.

schema.description: Binary content of the pdf file.

get.description: Retrieve a pdf file from the contract's signed document.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract which contains documents.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name that you want to give to the downloaded document.

get.description: Retrieve all documents bound to a contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to retrieve documents.

post.summary: Upload a document and attach it to a contract
post.description: Upload a document to the environment and attach it to a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to attach a new document to.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File binary to upload.

get.description: Retrieve a PDF file that contains all the documents from a contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to retrieve the pdf file.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file which will be downloaded.

get.description: Retrieve all recipients for a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to retrieve all recipients.

post.summary: Add a recipient to a contract
post.description: Attach an existing recipient to the contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to attach recipient.

recipient_id.description: ID of the recipient to attach to the contract.

signature_mode.description: Mode of signature. See documentation for further informations.

message_title.description: Title of the message to send by e-mail if there will be one.

message_body.description: Body of the message to send by e-mail if there will be one.

rank.description: Place of the recipient in the signature process. Rank and Smartrole are mutually exclusive. Choose only one of them or not at all.

smartrole.description: Smart role to give to the recipient. See documentation for further informations.

transport_mode.description: Transport mode of the signature. See documentation for further informations.

post.summary: Upload an attachment and add it to a contract
post.description: Upload a new attachment to the environment and attach it to a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to add an attachment.

parameters.name: contract_definition_id
parameters.description: Contract definition ID defined in your environment. Default is pdfadhoc.

parameters.name: option_definition_name
parameters.description: Definition name.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Files to add as attachments

post.summary: Send a contract to be signed
post.description: Send a specific contract and all his documents to be signed by recipients.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to send for signature.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to validate.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Specify if the contract validation must be forced, even if some signatories have not signed yet.

succeed.description: Specify if the contract has been cancelled.

post.description: Set the status of the contract to ABANDONED, even if the contract was sent for signature.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to withdraw.

succeed.description: Specify if the contract has been cancelled.

get.description: Stop the contract's transaction so you can modify contract documents and/or signatories.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to stop.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force transaction close even if signatories have already signed.

get.description: List all the signatures informations from a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to list all signatures.

get.summary: Resend notification email to a recipient
get.description: Send a notification email to a specific recipient for contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to resend notification.

parameters.name: cfc_id
parameters.description: ID of the recipient for contract object to send a notification.

succeed.description: Specify if the notification was successfully resend.

get.summary: Resend the notification email to all recipients
get.description: Send a notification email to all the recipients of a specific contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to resend notification.

succeed.description: Specify if the notification was successfully resend.

get.description: Download the proof file of the contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to download the proof file.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file which will be downloaded.

delete.description: Delete a recipient from a contract, by his recipient for contract ID. More information in the documentation.

parameters.name: cfc_id
parameters.description: ID of the recipient for contract object to delete.

succeed.description: Specify if it was removed successfully.

post.description: Create a new Bundle with at least one existing contract.

same_signatories.description: Set to false if contracts in the bundle do not have the same set of signatories.

get.description: Retrieve all contracts from a specific bundle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the bundle to retrieve contracts from.

post.summary: Add a contract to a bundle
post.description: Add an existing contract to an existing Bundle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Bundle to add contract.

contract_id.description: ID of the contract to add to the bundle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the bundle to send for signature.

succeed.description: Says if transaction has been sent or not.

post.description: Withdraw all contract in a bundle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the bundle to withdraw all contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Bundle to stop transaction.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force transaction close, even if signatories have already signed.

get.description: Counter-sign (validate) all contract in a bundle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the bundle to validate all contract.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force the contracts validation if some signatories have not signed yet (or have refused to sign).

get.description: Retrieve all perimeters associated to the connected environment.
Retrieve all the recipients associated to the current license.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximum size of the returned array.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Sequence number of the first recipient listed.

parameters.name: perimeter
parameters.description: Search only in the given perimeter.

parameters.name: get_custom_props
parameters.description: List recipients custom properties (increases response time).

parameters.name: get_perimeters
parameters.description: List recipient's perimeters in the responses (increases response time).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter on the lastname.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter on the email.

get.description: Retrieve a specific recipient in the saved list of recipients of the current environment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the recipient to retrieve.

success.description: Specify if successfully registered or not.

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook to retrieve it.

success.description: Specify if successfully registered or not.

key.description: Unique identifier to determine error informations.

success.description: Specify if successfully registered or not.

key.description: Unique identifier to determine error informations.

success.description: Specify if successfully registered or not.

key.description: Unique identifier to determine error informations.

post.description: This operation is triggered whenever a contract's status has changed.

delete.description: Will delete a webhook by ID.

date.description: Date at which the contract has been created.

document_token.description: Token of the contract's main document.

vendor_email.description: E-mail address of the Oodrive's license owner.

closed.description: Specify if the contract is closed or not.

contract_definition_id.description: ID of the contract definition used for this contract.

message_title.description: E-mail subject when sent for signature.

message_body.description: E-mail body when sent for signature.

keep_on_move.description: Determine if the offline signature on mobile device is activated.

closed_date.description: Date of closure of the contract, if there are any.

canceled_reason.description: Reason of the cancel, if there are any.

auto_close.description: Specify if the contract will be countersigned automatically or need a human intervention.

deleted.description: Specify if the contract has been deleted or not.

perimeters.description: List of all perimeters of the contract (if queried).

options.description: List of all specific options of the contract (if queried).

contract_properties.description: List of all optional contract properties (if queried).

contract_id.description: ID of the contract bound to this option.

element_definition_id.description: ID of the element definition of the option.

sync_timer.description: Timer that is used for synchronization issue.

last_modification_place.description: Indicates where the last modification took place.

placeholder.description: Label shown to the recipient when invited to fill in the property.

contract_id.description: ID of the contract associated to this custom property.

to_fill_by_user.description: Specify if user need to fill property or not.

field_type.description: Specify the type of the custom property. More informations in the documentation.

input_filter.description: List of possible choice for the property.

logical_removed.description: Specify if the property is logically removed.

used_by_contract.description: Set to true if the information must appear on the contract document.

required.description: Specify if property is required or not.

recipient_for_contract_id.description: Unique identifier of the couple contract and recipient.
recipient_for_contract_id.title: Recipient for contract ID

signature_date.description: Timestamp of the date of the sign mark.
signature_date.title: Signature date

smartrole.description: Smart Role associated to the recipient.
smartrole.title: Smart role

signature_id.description: ID of the signature from the recipient.
signature_id.title: Signature ID

rank.description: Place in the list of document.
rank.title: Rank

has_smart_field.description: Specify if the document has SmartFields.
has_smart_field.title: Has SmartField

size.description: Size of the document in bytes.
size.title: Document Size

transaction_id.description: Specify the transaction ID bound to the contract.
transaction_id.title: Contract Transaction ID

is_closed.description: Specify if the contract is closed.
is_closed.title: Is Closed

status.description: Specify the status of the contract.
status.title: Contract Status

key.description: Key of the perimeter (used by contracts).
key.title: Perimeter key

recipient_for_contract_id.description: ID of the object that bound the contract and the recipient.
recipient_for_contract_id.title: Recipient for contract ID

signature_date.description: Date of the last changes of the signature.
signature_date.title: Signature date

message_title.description: Title of the message bound to the contract's signature.
message_title.title: Message title

message_body.description: Body of the message bound to the contract's signature.
message_body.title: Message content

rank.description: Rank of the signature's recipient in the contract process.
rank.title: Rank

smartrole.description: Role of the signature's recipient in the contract.
smartrole.title: Smart role name

transport_mode.description: Transport mode of the contract bound to the signature.
transport_mode.title: Transport mode

has_refusal.description: Specify if the recipient did refuse the contract.
has_refusal.title: Has Refusal

contract_definition_type.description: Type of definition of the contract.
contract_definition_type.title: Contract definition type

company_name.description: Name of the company bound to the contract.
company_name.title: Company name

address_1.description: Main postal address of the recipient.

cell_phone.description: Mobile Phone number of the recipient.

address_2.description: Secondary postal address of the recipient.

content_type.description: Content-Type of the Appendix (image/jpeg for example).
content_type.title: Appendix Content-Type

actor_id.description: ID of the creator of the Bundle.
actor_id.title: Author ID

contract_id.description: ID of the first contract of the created Bundle.
contract_id.title: First Contract ID
